name: Mak Roberts
bio: Mark “Mak” Roberts is a Research Scientist at the Naval Research Laboratory who works in Automated Planning, Machine Learning, and Integrating Planning and Learning into interactive and applied AI systems.

name: Karen Myers
bio: Karen Myers is the Director of SRI International’s Artificial Intelligence Center, based in Menlo Park, CA, where she leads a team of 50 scientists conducting basic and applied research in AI. Her own research focuses on intelligent systems rooted in man-machine collaboration. Myers has led the development of several AI technologies that have been successfully transitioned into operational use in areas that span collaboration tools, task management, and end-user automation. She has published more than 100 papers in the field and been awarded seven patents. Myers is a AAAI Fellow and recently received the VentureBeat Summit Women in AI Award in recognition of her research contributions. Myers has a PhD in computer science from Stanford University and a degree in piano performance from the Royal Conservatory of Music.
